name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Executive.so | New Tab Supertool for Student and Work Productivity

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Built for the Top 1% of High-Achieving Students and Professionals

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Executive is a tool built to elevate you into the top 1% of productive top performers online, whether you are a high-achieving student or a busy professional.

Imagine how much more productive and satisfying your time online would be if you:

📅 Never miss another assignment or forget about a meeting.

🔔 Get notifications when new grades come in or an assignment is marked missing 

🚫 Stop wasting your time on distracting sites unless you really mean to go on them

📚 Let new knowledge and skills diffuse into your long-term memory with dynamic content presented in every new tab

📝 Quickly jot down notes as needed in your browsing experience

🔗 Save useful links to quickly access from your new tab

🔒 Privacy comes first, so everything is only stored locally on your computer so you can access it offline and it remains secure

Here are some of our other features that are built into your new tab experience with Executive:

Google Calendar Integration
- Automatically add new Google Calendar events from selected calendars to your new tab so you never miss a meeting

Canvas Integration
- Automatically pull all your assignments and events from Canvas  and see when they are completed so you never miss an upcoming assignment

Dynamic Input Fields:
- Typing a new event, you can just write out phrases like 'Today at 1pm' or 'Next Wednesday' or 'Tmrw' and it will automatically set the date with natural language processing

Smart Content for Vocabulary, APUSH, and More
- Each tab delivers relevant knowledge to help you build your vocabulary or prepare for tests without even having to think about it.
